name: Rings of Medusa 2: The Return of Medusa
name_original: Rings of Medusa 2: The Return of Medusa
description:
Rings of Medusa 2: The Return of Medusa is a RPG game developed by Starbyte Software. It came out on 01-01-1991. Starbyte Software published the game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
Rings of Medusa 2: The Return of Medusa is available on PC.
